entry.title: WIND WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 04:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SW 44 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning then to 70 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near zero.
